segments.text: Oh , my goodness . The traffic is crawling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think there is an accident ahead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . Why don't we take a different route ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check and look at the map . Yes , there is an exit three quarters of a mile ahead . We â€™ ll exit Market Street , head west , then get on the Pennsylvania Freeway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , let's do that , even though we may have to take a longer way .
segments.speaker: S2
